title: Fix nightly builds and release profile of ShardingSphere Proxy Native
body:
For #23873 and #21347.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Fix nightly builds of ShardingSphere Proxy Native. Refer to https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere/actions/runs/4076339389/jobs/7023936873 .
  - Fix release profile of ShardingSphere Proxy Native. Previously this Profile did not contain GraalVM Native Image binaries. Since the Release Profile is always executed after the Native Profile for ShardingSphere Proxy Native, it is a more reasonable choice to merge the two profiles.
  - Update protobuf-java-util to match GraalVM reachability metadata. Reference https://github.com/oracle/graalvm-reachability-metadata/pull/167 .
  - Update zookeeper to resolve ZOOKEEPER-4460 that prevents GraalVM Native Image from compiling, see https://github.com/oracle/graalvm-reachability-metadata/issues/163 .
  - Update jetcd-core to match GraalVM reachability metadata, see https://github.com/oracle/graalvm-reachability-metadata/pull/170 .
  - Split caffeine version in native profile to match GraalVM reachability metadata. Reference https://github.com/oracle/graalvm-reachability-metadata/pull/193 .
  - Update LICENSE.

---

title: Fix DELETED event handling skipped when pipeline job is dropped
body:
Related to #20849.

Currently, job configuration will be disabled and then deleted. When DELETE event is dispatched, job configuration is disabled, it just return, so DELETE event is ignored. It cause `new MigrationJobPreparer().cleanup` is skipped, so replication slot of PostgreSQL and openGauss won't be cleaned up when job is deleted.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Fix DELETED event ignored if pipeline job configuration is disabled
